title: Someone is trying to  steal my acc since the patch came out
body:
So I had to change my password 3 times since the patch came out because someone keeps hacking me and changing it.
Good thing is my e-mail seems to be secured so I just change the password and I can be back in but its starting to get annoying.
Made a ticket just wanted to share.

Anyone got a scary story BTW?

replies.body: If someone is able to get your password updated multiple times, it's likely that your e-mail is compromised as well. I'd suggest talking with the agents in your ticket to see about getting your verified e-mail changed, or possibly changing your email password as well.
